cyclone.name: BONNIE
cyclone.current_location: about 355 miles SE of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: Expected to slow, then turn northwest and north, moving toward the central South Carolina coast during the weekend
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near or just south of Charleston, SC (between Hilton Head Island and Georgetown)

weather_observation.warning_coast: Savannah River to Little River Inlet, South Carolina (includes Charleston)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Georgia and South Carolina coasts, extending northward into southeastern North Carolina
weather_observation.wind: Tropical storm–force winds (35–45 mph) possible late Saturday night through Sunday
weather_observation.storm_surge: 1–2 ft inundation possible along the lower South Carolina coast, including Charleston Harbor
weather_observation.rainfall: 1–3 inches expected with locally higher amounts
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along area beaches
